title: Do i still keep the icons permanently after renting an ultimate skin for 7-days?
body: so I have DJ Sona shard in my loot and I am short about 450 essence to permanently unlock it, but it has been 3 months now trying to get the skin and every box I open is just a champion shard, and I am really not keen on the skin it self my main need is the 3 icons it comes with, so my question is if I rent the skin for 7 days can I get the icons too and can I keep them after the shard disappears and the skin goes out of rental ?

replies.body:
I mean you would probably be the first person to rent a ultimate skin

I would personally ask Riot to have a plaque with my name on it

Did some testing to see what would happen, and sorry to let you know that the icons wouldn't unlock if rented.  You'll have to unlock the shard to it's full potential.  :x  Hope that helps clear things up, and good luck!
